author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patch submitted by Robert McIntosh to help unit test the static invoke tags

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the bean tag library so that an invoke method can be specified to be called on the beans once they are created.
This was suggested by Thomas Nichols

author: jstrachan
msg: Added an initial version of a <script> tag to the BSF library which should be usable in JavaScript, Jython, PNuts etc

author: jstrachan
msg: added patch supplied by Christiaan ten Klooster to support the setting of colours of widgets

author: jstrachan
msg: added patch supplied by Christiaan ten Klooster to support images
